text: The Wedding Ringer (formerly known as The Golden Tux)http://www.empireonline.com/news/story.asp?NID=19756 is a 2015 American buddy romantic comedy movie. It was written and produced by Jeremy Garelick. The movie was distributed by Screen Gems. The movie stars Kevin Hart, Josh Gad, Kaley Cuoco, and Olivia Thirlby. It released on January 16, 2015. == Plot == Jimmy (Kevin Hart) owns a wedding company. He provides best man services to socially awkward guys who don't have anyone close enough to be their best man. Doug (Josh Gad) is a groom-to-be. He finds himself without a best man. He turns to Jimmy for help. ==Cast== *Kevin Hart as Jimmy Callahan *Josh Gad as Doug Harris *Kaley Cuoco as Gretchen Palmer *Alan Ritchson as Kip *Cloris Leachman as Grandma *Mimi Rogers as Lois Palmer *Ken Howard as Ed Palmer *Affion Crockett as Reggie/Drysdale *Lindsay Pearce as Alexandra Plylow *Jenifer Lewis as Doris Jenkins *Olivia Thirlby as Alison Palmer *Francisco Gattorno as David *Eugenio Cobo as Roberto *Fernando Colunga as Jose == References == == Other websites == * Category:2015 comedy movies Category:English-language movies Category:Movies about weddings Category:Movies set in Los Angeles
title: The Wedding Ringer
